CustomField.description: Orig: If ( PricebookEntry.Product2.IPR__c > 0, BR() & "Restriction: use for '" & text(Use_Restriction__c) & "' only.", " ")
CustomField.formula: If ( OR(ISBLANK(TEXT(Use_Restriction__c)),TEXT(Use_Restriction__c)="-"), " ", BR() & "Restriction: use for '" & text(Use_Restriction__c) & "' only.")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Text as it appears on quotations
CustomField.label: Use Restriction Text
